name: Garden Birbs
description:
A Viva Pinata inspired game with birds. Do gardening, attract birds, fill out your birdy-dex! Features authentic british bird sounds! Customise your games "soundtrack" by attracting the birds you want to hear!

Controls:

WASD for movement, shift to run

Left Click to interact with the environment, and to move items in inventory

Right Click to use an item from the inventory

Tab to open inventory

Game currently supports modding, and a SDK will be produced at a future date to allow loading custom birds, plants, and more!
